about_the_game:
Welcome to the world of chaos and survival in the game "Last Day to Die"!

Get ready for continuous battles and strategic decisions in this post-apocalyptic struggle for survival. Embrace the night with weapons in hand, ready to face endless waves of zombies, breathing heavily down your imaginary neck. But don't rest easy during the day - the sun doesn't signify safety. Bandits lurk in the ruins of the city, ready to deprive you of your last resources in a merciless fight for survival.



You and your friends must join forces to obtain gasoline for your transport, which may become your only salvation from this hellish landscape. Traverse the desolate streets, explore abandoned buildings, and challenge everything that stands in your way.



But remember, resources are limited, so every decision, every shot, and every supply must be used wisely. Help each other out, devise strategies, and apply all your skills to stay alive in this unforgiving world.

Are you ready for the challenge? Don't forget, every sunrise could be your last.

content_descriptors.notes: Your character kills zombies using bladed weapons, firearms, and hand-to-hand combat. When hit, a blood effect may be played. Zombies can attack the player and beat him. The zombie's body is decaying flesh, but without any nudity.

detailed_description:
Welcome to the world of chaos and survival in the game "Last Day to Die"!

Get ready for continuous battles and strategic decisions in this post-apocalyptic struggle for survival. Embrace the night with weapons in hand, ready to face endless waves of zombies, breathing heavily down your imaginary neck. But don't rest easy during the day - the sun doesn't signify safety. Bandits lurk in the ruins of the city, ready to deprive you of your last resources in a merciless fight for survival.



You and your friends must join forces to obtain gasoline for your transport, which may become your only salvation from this hellish landscape. Traverse the desolate streets, explore abandoned buildings, and challenge everything that stands in your way.



But remember, resources are limited, so every decision, every shot, and every supply must be used wisely. Help each other out, devise strategies, and apply all your skills to stay alive in this unforgiving world.

Are you ready for the challenge? Don't forget, every sunrise could be your last.
name: Last Day to Die

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460 or AMD FX™-6300 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1050 GTX
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770 or AMD FX™-9590 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 2070 RTX
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

dejus.descriptors:
Violência Extrema
Linguagem imprópria
Atos criminosos

short_description: The game offers intense survival gameplay where you and your friends must battle zombies by night and fend off bandits by day in a post-apocalyptic world. Work together to survive!
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese, Russian
*languages with full audio support
